title: Testing with Lettuce and Splinter
description:
Testing with Lettuce and Splinter

Presented by Adam Nelson

Lettuce, adapted from Ruby's Cucumber, is a behavior driven development
(BDD) testing suite that sits on top of Splinter - a web driver for
simulating real- world usage of your site. Learn the ins and outs of BDD
using Lettuce and Splinter for rapid deployment.
